reviewText: It's just a rehearsal and they are not 'performing' No orchestra, just piano. A bit dull for me.

If you were a fan of Cynthia Gregory's and Fernando Bujones' partnership, you won't want to miss this.  The first half of the video takes you through a run through of their most popular pas de deux, complete with sweat and exhaustion.  The second half is the complete third act of Coppelia. The bonus interview with Ms. Gregory is very informative.  A completely enjoyable way to spend an evening with your favorite dancers.
Fernando Bujones dances with harmony, gest and body totally in harmony and beauty. This is a great document to remember his magnificience.

They are incredible together or individually!  Frequently badly lit and the wandering camera angles made me crazy, but anything is worth it just to see them.  The "extra" interview with Cynthia was good, too.
